org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.socket

Class ClientSocketManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.socket.SocketHandler
        • org.anhcraft.spaciouslib.socket.ClientSocketManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientSocketManager
extends SocketHandler
    A class helps you to manage the connections between a socket client and a server socket.
    This class is for the client side.

      • ClientSocketManager

        public ClientSocketManager(java.lang.String address,
                           int port,
                           ClientSocketHandler requestHandler)
        Creates a new client socket and starts a new thread for handling the requests.
        Parameters:
        address - the IP address or hostname of a socket server
        port - the TCP/IP port which is listening by a socket server
        requestHandler - a handler for this client socket
